patterns.card_pattern: Use styled(MuiCard) with borderRadius: 12, theme spacing p: 2.5, transition effects for hover states
patterns.styling_approach: Emotion with styled() from @mui/material/styles, use theme.palette and theme.spacing
patterns.api_pattern: Always use inspectionsApi service from api/inspections.ts, never direct axios calls
patterns.type_pattern: Import Finding, FindingSeverity from types/index.ts, use Partial<Finding> for updates
patterns.component_structure: React functional components with TypeScript, use MUI Box/Typography/Grid for layout
patterns.state_management: useState for local state, optimistic UI updates, loading skeletons for async operations
